name: Discover Tangerang
description:
Known as "Benteng" (fortress) city, Tangerang is rich in culture and history dated since the first encounter of Chinese merchants in 17th century. There are many historical evidence that could still be traced throughout the city.

From the Islamic sites like Al-Azhom mosque with its large dome, the oldest Chinatown in Java and the Dutch heritage of water technology monuments are preserved well here. Not only with historical places, Tangerang has a lot to offer regarding delicious foods!

We'll take the "Angkot" (Shared Taxi) to travel throughout the city so that you'll be living like a locals at the time.

For you whom into cultural things, it'll be a good choice to visit Tangerang and exlore what it could offer to you!
